enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve the creation and initialization of collections, which can be reused for setting up the test environment.
The 'put' method retrieves existing collections using 'getCollection', making it a suitable candidate for setting up the test environment.
The 'put' method adds values to collections, and 'containsValue' can be used to assert that the added values are present in the collections.
The 'put' method affects the size of collections, and 'size' can be used to assert the expected size of the collections after adding values.
